title: Major UI Overhaul, Rank System Updates & More!

content.content: We're excited to announce a massive update to Connect Ranked! This update brings a complete visual overhaul, improvements to the rank system, and various quality of life enhancements.
üé® Complete UI Redesign
Every screen in the game has been redesigned with a modern, sleek dark theme. The new UI features:

items: Unified color palette with consistent blue accents throughout
Cleaner, more professional button designs
Improved card layouts with better spacing and shadows
Enhanced readability with optimized text sizes and contrast
Smoother animations and transitions

content.content: üèÜ Rank System Improvements

items: Simplified rank divisions: Each rank now has 3 divisions instead of 5
Rank images now display consistently across the game
Tournament titles now show rank images instead of text-only names
Better visual hierarchy for rank displays

content.content: üìä Enhanced Match History

items: Match history expanded from 5 to 10 recent matches
Scrollable match history for better navigation
Trophy tracking: See your trophies before and after each match
Improved match result visualization

content.content: ‚è±Ô∏è Queue Screen Updates

items: Time elapsed counter shows how long you've been in queue
Estimated wait time displayed for transparency
Visual progress bar for queue progress
Cleaner, more informative queue interface

content.content: üéÅ Crate Opening Improvements
The crate opening animation has been refined with the removal of the close button during the reveal, ensuring you don't accidentally skip the exciting moment when your reward is revealed!
üêõ Bug Fixes

items: Fixed various UI alignment issues
Improved consistency across all screens
Better responsive design for different screen sizes
Performance optimizations throughout the app

content.content: We hope you enjoy these improvements! Keep climbing the ranks and good luck in your matches!
Express yourself with the new Profile Picture system! PFPs are now available in the game, allowing you to customize your profile even further.
How to Get PFPs

items: Purchase PFPs from the shop (when available)
Unlock PFPs from crates
Special event rewards (coming soon)

content.content: Using Your PFP
Your equipped PFP will appear on the left side of your banner on both the main menu and in-game. Visit the Inventory to browse and equip your PFPs from the new PFPs tab!
PFPs come in various rarities and can have special attributes, just like banners and titles. Start collecting today!
Welcome to Connect Ranked - a competitive Connect 4 experience! Take on AI opponents, climb the ranked ladder, and compete in tournaments every 10 minutes.
Key Features

items: Competitive ranked matchmaking with 23 unique ranks
Tournaments every 10 minutes with exclusive rewards
Seasonal progression with special titles and banners
In-game shop with rotating cosmetic items

content.content: Good luck on your journey to Connect Legend!

Season 3 is here! Based off your performance in season 2, you earned PFP rewards, and new title rewards! Starting from this season on, each rank will have a title reward, where Grand Champion and Connect Legend will have special glow effects.
Season 2 Rewards

Below is the list of PFP rewards youll recieve based off where you ended up in season 2. Note, you also get every banner below your rank, so if your Diamond for example, you get all the rewards from below diamond as well. Banners are sorted from lowest rank to highest (starting at Bronze)
We hope you'll stick around for season 3!
